articles.title: Indias largest lithium-ion battery plant starts production in Gujarat - Business Standard
articles.description: The plant, with total installed capacity of 1.5 Gigawatt hours (GWh), has six automated assembly lines on which it will produce batteries for automobiles and energy storage applications
articles.content: Indian battery maker Exide Industries and joint venture partner Switzerland's Leclanche SA have begun mass production at the nation's largest lithium-ion battery plant in the western state of Gujarat… [+2289 chars]
